title: In Successor Religion New Moral Precepts Disseminate Like Fashion
description:
A bit from my conversation with BJ Campbell of https://hwfo.substack.com/

Discord link. Good for just a few days. Check with more recent videos for a fresh link. https://discord.gg/XBXwBBvf
